mc.printedText: Whenever a player casts a white spell, you may gain 1 life.
mc.flavorText: If taken, it cuts the hand that clutches it. If given, it heals the hand that holds it.

mc.printedText: Whenever a player casts a black spell, you may gain 1 life.
mc.flavorText: Its curve mimics the twists of life and death.

mc.oracleText: Whenever a player casts a red spell, you may gain 1 life.
mc.printedText: Whenever a player casts a red spell, you may gain 1 life.
mc.flavorText:

mc.printedText: Whenever a player casts a blue spell, you may gain 1 life.
mc.flavorText: It's seen the wonders of entire worlds trapped in the depths of a bottomless ocean.

Flying

mc.printedText:
Flying
You can't lose the game and your opponents can't win the game.

mc.printedText: Whenever a player casts a green spell, you may gain 1 life.
mc.flavorText:

--The Tall Tales of Oleander

"We'll scale these cliffs, traverse Brittle Bridge, and then fight our way down the volcanic slopes on the other side."

"Yes."
"So shouldn't we--"
"No."
